name: tm65
effect: Teaches Shadow Claw to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Shadow Claw to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.
